price: Nasi tukamfunulia Musa kumwambia: Tupa fimbo yako. Mara ikavimeza vyote vile walivyo vibuni.
arabic: ۞ وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنۡ أَلۡقِ عَصَاكَۖ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَلۡقَفُ مَا يَأۡفِكُونَ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu akaitoa amri yake kumpelekea Musa: Tupa fimbo yako. Sasa umekwisha fika wakati wake. Akaitupa kama alivyo amrishwa. Mara hiyo fimbo ikaingia kuvimeza vile vizushi vyao walivyo zua na kubuni!

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-awḥaynā ilā mūsā an alqi ʿaṣāka fa-idhā hiya talqafu mā yafikūna
